physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 37.0°C; Blood Pressure: Not specified; Heart Rate: Not specified; Respiratory Rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tenderness in the bilateral lumbar paraspinal muscles; neurologic examination normal; multilevel degenerative disk disease revealed on lumbar spine radiography.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Later that day, temperature reached 38.9°C; fever, chills, myalgias of back and calves developed.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 37.8°C; Blood Pressure: Not specified; Heart Rate: Not specified; Respiratory Rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Moxibustion marks on the upper back; swollen, tender area on the upper lateral aspect of the left testicle.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 37.8°C then rose to 38.3°C; Blood Pressure: 126/64 mm Hg; Heart Rate: 74 bpm; Respiratory Rate: 18 breaths per minute; Oxygen Saturation: 97%
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient appeared somewhat fatigued; no scleral icterus; normal oropharyngeal findings; supple neck with normal range of motion; non-tender spine and paraspinal muscles; no adenopathy; faint rales at lung bases; scattered bilateral rhonchi and wheezes; normal bowel sounds; abdomen soft, nontender, and nondistended; joints with full range of motion; guaiac-negative stool; normal motor strength.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 38.1 to 39.6°C; Blood Pressure: Not specified; Heart Rate: Not specified; Respiratory Rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral pleural effusions larger than on admission; persistent opacities at lung bases and right apex.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature: 40.1°C; Blood Pressure: Not specified; Heart Rate: Not specified; Respiratory Rate: Not specified
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Swelling, pain, and tenderness recurred in the left scrotum; urinalysis revealed 2+ blood and 10 to 20 red cells per high-power field.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up ultrasound showed new engorgement of testicular vessels, suggestive of epididymo-orchitis.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: New engorgement of testicular vessels noted during follow-up.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased engorgement compared to previous ultrasound.
